content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hi Emilia, good to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price. I am always looking for the highest possible price. So, how much are you willing to pay for this apartment? Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate the quality of the apartment and its central location. However, as a student, I am on a budget. I am looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment while also being within my means. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your situation, but I am a landlord, and my goal is to get the highest price possible for my apartment. So, how much do you think is a fair price for this apartment? Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I've done some research and I believe a fair price for this apartment would be around €650 per month. This takes into account the quality of the apartment and its prime location. Would you be willing to consider this price?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, €650 is quite low for such a great apartment in the city center. I am willing to negotiate, but I think €850 would be a more reasonable price. Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, €850 is quite high for a student like me. I'm willing to pay €700 per month, which I believe is a fair compromise considering the apartment's condition and location. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, €700 is still too low for this apartment. I am willing to be flexible, but I think €800 would be a better compromise. Remember, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your flexibility. €800 is more in line with what I had in mind. I agree to the price of €800 Euro!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [€800] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
